tactical.translation[0].definitions[0].d: relating to what you do to achieve what you want, especially as part of a game or large plan
tactical.translation[0].definitions[0].n: tactical error/mistake/blunder (=a mistake that will harm your plans later)
tactical.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Two players were substituted for tactical reasons.
a tactical decision to send in troops
tactical.translation[0].definitions[1].d: relating to the way military forces are arranged in a battle
tactical.translation[1].definitions[0].d: done in order to achieve what you want at a later time, especially in a large plan
tactical.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Their agreement was a tactical move to avoid the threat of legal action.
tactical.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a mistake that will harm your plans in the future
tactical.translation[1].definitions[1].e: It was probably a tactical mistake to offer the contract to a new company.
